snippet: As he reaches 20 years as artistic director of American Ballet Theater, Kevin McKenzie reflects on the company’s past struggles and its future possibilities.
abstract: American Ballet Theater artistic director Kevin McKenzie reflects on the company's past and future; McKenzie was recently recognized for 20 years of service with the dance company.
lead_paragraph: As he reaches 20 years as artistic director of American Ballet Theater, Kevin McKenzie reflects on the company’s past struggles and its future possibilities.

headline.seo: American Ballet Theater’s Director, Kevin McKenzie
headline.main: A Pragmatist In the Realm Of Perfection
headline.print_headline: A Pragmatist In the Realm Of Perfection
